website_summaries.verdict: Converse's most popular sneaker with good reason. It has a classic look, good construction, and excellent durability.
pros: Classic look doesn't go out of style
Canvas upper cleans well and holds up to tough wear
cons: Sizing can be hard if you've never worn Converse before

website_summaries.verdict: A unisex shoe with classic Converse design. The quality you'd expect with the color choices to fit your personality.
pros: Colors stay bright and bold even after lots of wear
cons: They run a little long if you've never worn Converse shoes before

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Very pleased with them! FYI... sizing with this particular Converse style runs large. I wear a size 7 in women's, which would typically be a size 5 in men's. In these, I wear a 4 /2.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are FAKE. Stitching is different compared to my real Converse & quality/weight doesn't feel the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed, but not surprised
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed, but not surprised. I'm writing this review on September 5th. and I bought the shoes on June 9th. The sole and shoe on the right has already started to pull apart. This is typical with Chucks, but not after such a short amount of time. I assume these were real chucks and they look and feel "real" in every aspect, but the quality just ins't there. Do you buy shoes to wear for 3 months? No. Even for cheap shoes I expect them to last me longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: lto2012

customer_reviews.title: The shoe was perfectly fine but I found the sizing chart very confusing
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was perfectly fine but I found the sizing chart very confusing. I had intended to buy a woman's eight and a half and ended up with a men's.
customer_reviews.author: Medina

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size/color off.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I will ever purchase converse from Amazon. The first seller sent me mens size I stead of women size. I bought these and swear I picked them in burgundy. I normally wear size 10 but read reviews and based on them decided to buy 9.5 .......they are not burgundy...they are bright red, and I would live with that. But they are still too big on me. They are too long and too wide. I would love to return and get smaller size but they don't have them in a color I want! Be careful, very complicated process to get what you want.
customer_reviews.author: ewa

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a size 9 which my typical size. They are a full size too big, wish I had read reviews before ordering because apparently this is typical. I went to a store to try on the 8 and although they fit they were really uncomfortable so I didn’t buy them. They have no arch support and art pretty hard. I think I would have a headache within a few hours. I am disappointed because they are so cute and my girls have matching pairs!
customer_reviews.author: AlyVonD

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the quality of these converse. I have been wearing converse for over ten years and have always boasted that they are the best shoes; long-lasting, great quality. I wear mine literally every day and they still last forever. However, I replaced a pair with this last purchase, wore them out once, and the rubber has already separated from the sole all around the rim of the shoe. Just from one wear! They are falling apart already! I am very disappointed as I love converse and intended to keep always wearing them. I will not be purchasing again. I am hoping this was a fluke, and I received a marred pair, but I am unsure.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Furrow

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive in a shoe box
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fine...arrived in a regular cardboard amazon box and not in a converse shoe box. It would have been nice to know since they are a gift. It’s a little tacky to give a gift of shoes and them not be in the box they should come in, looks like you just grabbed them from your own closet instead of actually getting them special for the recipient
customer_reviews.author: Miss S

customer_reviews.title: True to experience with Converse, male or female, .5 size large
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband... He hasn’t been a classic Chucks fan even though I am a die hard, but he loves these classic white sneakers! He wears 11.5-12 and true to Converse, they run a wee bit close to .5 size large. I got him the 11.5 and they are roomy so he may fit perfectly into 11’s.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: cute, cozy, clean
customer_reviews.text: so cute, clean and crisp. My first pair of low top converse! If you ever need to wash them take the shoe laces off and rub whitening toothpaste on them, put them in a bucket with hot water, a splash of bleach and if you're extra like me some fresh lemon juice and baking soda. Scrub stains with an old toothpaste, and then let them soak in the potion, I let mine soak for several hours or over night. Then throw them in the washer, NO DRYER. <-- same steps for Both the shoes and laces and air dry or lay in front of fan
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Converse DUPES
customer_reviews.text: First....these are Converse DUPES!! They are not legitimately Converse. Authentic Converse reads “Converse All Star” Converse Dupes reads “All Star” Second....unboxing.....they looked USED!!! Scruffs up and down the shoe, along the sides and dirty shoe laces. Third.....keep shopping. You’ll have better luck at Goodwill buying used items.
customer_reviews.author: Alon_Ann

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought one pair and they were too small so I returned them. No issues there. Second pair was a fake. I knew immediately because the box was wrapped in a plastic bag. The soles were super shiny and hard to bend and the interior was white. I bought all black so the interior should have been black as well. I plan to return these and just buy them in person to avoid having to return another fake pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Barb

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and went PERFECT with my outfit for Cardinals Opening Day in Saint Louis! I will be purchasing more colors! These were my very first pair of converse and I am in LOVE! I wore them all day and they were comfortable, they even got stepped on and dirty the first wear, but I sprayed them with protectant before wearing and they were super easy to clean off. Even the marks in the red cloth part came out pretty easy and they looked brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Lexis Luv

customer_reviews.title: I got this in my normal size of the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this in my normal size of the other chucks I wear however they came out to be a bit to big. Which was rather surprising as I thought ALL chucks were sized the same. My other ones are a different style which may contribute to the size issue.. But either way.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Lee

customer_reviews.title: True to size! Converse always run a half size bigger but it’s not too much of a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Converse always run a half size bigger. My boyfriend is a 13 and we ordered a 13. He said they fit perfectly and that it had a little extra room but not much. He loves them. (: I bought my converse on eBay because amazon was out of size 8s. Now I’m usually anywhere between sizes 7-8. I got the 7.5 and they fit perfectly. I don’t even get the blisters you usually get from new shoes lol love them!
customer_reviews.author: CocoKarina

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite, but still cute.
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of sneakers. Converse are new for me but I have a few pairs. These ones are wider, heaviers and thicker then my other low sitting converse. I don't care for that and because of that they get worn a lot less then other sneakers I won.
customer_reviews.author: M&GManning

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a mens 12, received a 7, not in original box either, the red die on the tag bled......these might be fake, who knows anymore, what a rip
customer_reviews.author: joseph gamel

customer_reviews.title: "Everything" shoe
customer_reviews.text: I will probably buy these shoes for the rest of my life. For me they are perfect. Black on black, plain basic shoe. Not that I recommend it, but i walked around a 6 mile lake wearing them and I felt perfectly fine. They are a good, "everything" shoe. I wear them for work, play and casual wear. I have 3 pair!
customer_reviews.author: RT ॐ

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable and well received by gift recipient.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift, the shoes were somewhat longer when compared to the older pair they were replacing. Thankfully, the gift recipient stated that the shoes felt very comfortable and rather than break them in over 4 hours, was able to wear them the entire eight hour shift. This turned out to be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: savy-consumer

customer_reviews.title: Same as it ever was
customer_reviews.text: Just like the Chucks of my youth. No support, light weight and a great look. But you should know all this if your purchasing a sneaker with such history. A little tighter in the toes than I recall (smaller toes). That may change as they break in. And no sneaker has a better broken in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Tongue is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this color after I wore through my old pair, but the shoes aren't quite right. The loop on the tongue is off center, which bothers me and leads to constantly adjusting the tongue. For the price, the shoes should've been perfect. Other than that, they're just like the pair I wore through that I got at a Converse outlet.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size smaller than your Nike size
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple converse high tops and always get 0.5 size smaller than my Nike size. There was one pair, however, that I got in my actual size and it fit perfectly, so I decided to go with women's 7.5 with these white low tops. They're a little large, but I love them and they aren't critically larger than my feet which is why I didn't bother exchanging them. But 7's would probably fit perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: MY MISTAKE... CONFUSED THE MEN'S SIZE 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: MY MISTAKE...CONFUSED THE MEN'S SIZE 10 WITH THE WOMEN'S SIZE 12, WHEN IT SHOULD'VE BEEN MEN'S SIZE 12. THESE LATE-NIGHT ORDERS ARE PLAYING TRICKS ON THESE "OLD EYES", I DON'T HAVE A PRINTER BUT i'LL TRY AND MAKE SOME OTHER ARRANGEMENTS FOR AN EXCHANGE, NOT A REFUND. PERHAPS I CAN DRIVE TO THE MILLIKIX IN BELLFLOWER TO MAKE AN EXCHANGE ON 3-16-18, NO PROBLEM.
customer_reviews.author: C. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable wore them first day out of the box at work on concrete floors for ten hours and didnt hurt my feet at all. Not even my toes were cramped. The color was perfect as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Typical Chucks..
customer_reviews.text: These fit exactly like expected. I've had them several months now and wear them almost daily (barring any Pennsylvania snow, of course). They've held up great, no threads or seams coming loose yet - definitely beats braving the mall crowds for the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Vorpe

customer_reviews.title: =C I'm sad I paid full price for fake converse
customer_reviews.text: do not buy from, san george new fashion 2016, the product is a bootleg converse, badly made and if we were to wear it, it would fall apart in days. =C I'm sad I paid full price for fake converse. I thought I was buying from converse itself, NOPE.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes; wrong fit and size?
customer_reviews.text: Chuck's are the best; they've been my favorite for 20 years. We purchased the red this last time, which was vibrant and beautiful in color, but the toe-ends of the shoes are narrower than they used to be and hurt my toes (and I have naturally slender, flexible, narrow feet). They also came way too big in size. Something for the company/seller to consider? A great quality in shoes otherwise. -Love & Rant
customer_reviews.author: Author Lindsay Swanberg

customer_reviews.title: Size down!!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew these shoes run large. I normally wear a size 9, so I decided to order an 8.5. It was HUGE on me! I returned them and ordered a 7.5 and they fit perfectly. Normally I'm a size 9, occasionally 8.5, but I have never needed anything under an 8. Be warned! Otherwise, the shoes arrived in perfect, unworn condition with no stains.
customer_reviews.author: dela

customer_reviews.title: Were a little loose for my wife, we send them back
customer_reviews.text: We send them back to replace them for a smaller size, they are great products, we are very happy with them, I think this can happen when you buy clothes or shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Barreda

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Umm, they're chucks the color of wine...are words necessary? I think Jesus made that stuff out of some water that one time, js. (I mean technically, anyone who has ever made wine has made it from water, but you get what I'm saying. Yes, these are words, but were they necessary? I rest my case.)
customer_reviews.author: nikkiB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 19 year old daughter. They go with everything, and she claims they are very comfortable as well. Packaged neatly in a nice black and white Converse box, and they arrived two days early! A+ all around, I would highly recommend this particular seller.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: These Chuck Taylor's have made a convert out of me!
customer_reviews.text: bought these to wear to my daughter's dance competitions and match with some of the other moms. The delivery was on point, came two days before it had to and the shoes came untouched, in their box. The red color was vibrant and fun and really put the outfit together. I am not normally a Chuck wearer but these were super comfy and even kept me comfortable while walking through Universal Studios all day. I may be a Chuck convert now!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around kicks
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes. The construction is good and the finish of the sneakers are excellent. The arch support is the standard vanilla not so much. I replaced the insoles with a better orthotic and my 13 year old loves them. She wears them for school instead of just PE because they're black and make the dress code. Good choice. If the arch was top notch or above average they'd be 5 stars all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K WPB,FL

customer_reviews.title: Leopard-Print Converse (Chuck Taylor's)
customer_reviews.text: More Chuck's to add to my collection; makes me feel young again. No, the shoes don't provide arch support; they're sneakers. Was happy to find them in a cotton leopard print. Sizing is purrrfect (meow) in the length and width. These are unisex shoes. I take a size 4 in men's which is a 6 in ladies. Authentic. Fun.
customer_reviews.author: BanTrophyHunting

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION:  I am rating the size, not the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12-13 in most shoes. I ordered an 11.5 because I know Chucks generally run large (I have another pair of size 12 high-tops and they fit well, if perhaps slightly too long). However, I might have to wear a size 10.5 in these low tops. I believe that sizing variance is a bit silly. I returned the shoes and did not try another size. Perhaps some day in the future I will, but to be off that much is ridiculous. I am very satisfied with my other size 12 Chucks, but evidently there is no standardization in Chuck Taylor shoe sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Roanoke9000

customer_reviews.title: Just what my husband wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love my white converse so much I got my husband a pair. Great quality and super white! Love the look of them!! You can never go wrong with a good pair of converse.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen Shorey

customer_reviews.title: That they look and feel good.
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loved the way they look he is into the color green so i brought the low cut green converse he says their old shcool and he put them on for the first time yesterday and they looked great on him
customer_reviews.author: Sonya mcphail

customer_reviews.title: converse difference
customer_reviews.text: I will say that although these fit as I expected, they are also like my 10th pair of converses over the years so I know exactly the size I needed. The difference, for me personally, I have long narrow feet so the mens style fit me better. The converses made for women are slightly wider and even the same size would tend to feel floppy on me. I normally wear a 6.5 in normal tennis shoes but for converse I wear a mens 4 which is equal to a womens 6.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great classic shoe. Order a half-size down
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5 but for Converse I've consistently bought a half-size down and they fit snugly. It's known that Converse have a flat insole so I recommend getting shoe inserts for all-day wear. These usually last me a year or two, but yours will probably last longer if you're not constantly taking them to outdoor events. Great classic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Converse Redux.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are about a 1/2 size large, but I can live with that. The cloth material is thinner than I remember the original being, but that's a looong time ago. Delivery was when expected. I never dealt w/the Company I purchased from. Still not a bad value and a retro look for $44 delivered.
customer_reviews.author: TODMTNS

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice NEITHER WERE CORRECT
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair of off whites last week they were extremely too big. Sent them back ordered a smaller pair and recived a pair that fit but they were the wrong color. Done with this seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina S.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Chucks - Always a Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Classic Chuck Taylors in Charcoal -- I have finally gotten him to replace his knock-off Chucks with these, and he keeps remarking how much better they are than what he had. So far, they have held up well, and the Charcoal color is great for everyday wear. Chuck Taylors are well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: KMBS

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged and very dirty. Shoe has some spots on it and one ...
customer_reviews.text: I always wear size 4 men, 6 women but this shoe size is wrong. I ordered 4 men size again but too large. Box was damaged and very dirty. Shoe has some spots on it and one of the shoe don't even have a lace. Missing shoelace. Very bad experience. I am returning it back.
customer_reviews.author: Newyorker

customer_reviews.title: Not a genuine product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a genuine product of Converse!!! I bought it from the seller named "IPAYTEE" and after less than a month of use the shoe soles are destroyed. I noticen some furry pieces on the soles while cleaning them and when I pulled it, it came out and you can see the result on the photos. I have owned several pairs of Converse and I could not wear out any of them, they are almost like new after years of frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe for lifting
customer_reviews.text: I love Chucks. The monochrome black are my favorite and I wear them in and out of the gym. I throw them in the washer when I need to! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing these and ordered them in a size ( 9m/7w). The majority of the reviews said that these shoes were men's and ran large. This is not true!! When you order them order your true size because that is what you are getting. I got the wrong size and the seller was so nice and helpful when I contacted them. The shoes are really nice and true to the picture, super happy with my purchase even though I got the wrong size...( I ended up giving them to a family member..who is thrilled - so I'm happy). - to the sellers, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Robison

customer_reviews.title: They are great! I can wear them comfortably all day
customer_reviews.text: They are great! I can wear them comfortably all day. They don't have much arch support, as is expected with Chuck Taylors, but it doesn't make much difference, as they are very comfortable for casual wear. They aren't for running or sports though, so go buy a good pair of cross trainers or running shoes if you're looking for arch support. They are perfect for what I bought them for though.
customer_reviews.author: Rancher_Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They fit well and go with almost any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Tanz

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice, and what I expected as far as quality. I did end up returning them though because I thought I was ordering what was pictured (Black low cut) but got Navy Blue High Tops...I would have kept them as they are nice but I just can't pull off the high top look.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli M Eyres

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: These were for my son and I mailed them to him in another state. I'm assuming they were a good fit since I didn't hear back from him on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a pair of these for years. Finally purchased. They run 1 size too big. Order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: DROD

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend a half size lower if you are usually a ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7-7.5 and I got this in 7.5. I have very narrow feet and these feel a lot loose, especially in the toe box. Would recommend a half size lower if you are usually a size 7.5 (EU 38) with narrow set feet. It looks amazing though! Love how it’s all white.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits great. The look and style are good too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Iconic and beyond reproach
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my 17th pair. I still have every single pair I have ever bought. They are iconic.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McNamara

customer_reviews.title: I don't particularly like them since the sole comes apart on the side ...
customer_reviews.text: 16-year old daughter loves them and buys them all the time. I don't particularly like them since the sole comes apart on the side seams very quickly but she likes them anyway even though they have no arch support and are very flat.
customer_reviews.author: From California

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fitting.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this brand for some years, but this is the first time ordering from Amazon. Just got them in, they look clean and fit me well. Box could've been in better shape, but shoes are untouched.
customer_reviews.author: MR Y

customer_reviews.title: very cute, proper sizing is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: very cute, but runs a bit large. Selecting the proper size is a challenge - hard to tell if the sizing selections are men's sizes or women's sizes, and there are no half sizes. I normally wear a women's 8, but a women's 7.5 (or whatever the men's equivalent is) would have been perfect. They are super cute though and comfortable despite the little extra length.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca T.

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is not the older quality but I’m a traditionalist non the less
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product as a repeat order even though my previous pair had a severe sole separation. I have worn this style of shoe since 1962 and never had a sole separation. I’ve seen this occupy the internet.
customer_reviews.author: nicnic

customer_reviews.title: Real converse.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they're all black so my shoes don't look as dirty when I go to my customers house's. The toe cap keeps me from getting wet feet when i walk through wet grass.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Goto summer casual
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and various colors of Converse. They are so casual but so cute. Great summertime ballgame shoes. You will have to break them in a little though
customer_reviews.author: ChasingOkay

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected / full refund not issued
customer_reviews.text: 2 sizes larger than normal shoes. When I returned item seller only refunded a fraction of the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cute shoes. Can be worn casually with jeans or sweats or even as an unexpected additional with a boho dress.
customer_reviews.author: Mimzy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my niece. I read some reviews that these run slightly big, which is perfect for someone who is growing like a weed. She wears a size 7, which is what I ordered. As soon as she tried them on, she fell in love with them, and wears them more than any other shoe she has. Item shipped was exactly what I was hoping for, and arrived on the early side of the delivery window.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Winner

customer_reviews.title: sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: I got my normal size and they are a tad too big but not too bad I will keep them. I like how they look.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger Fan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Get compliments all day long. Fit great and perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Berryman

customer_reviews.title: great fit and price
customer_reviews.text: i use these to deadlift in and they are great second pair i have owned and love them. great fit true to size and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Eugene K. Babineaux

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them.  I cant understand why
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them, they fit as expected and similar to other brands. As described fit and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: Converses Rule!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's first pair of Converses. They fit great and he's hooked now!
customer_reviews.author: T. Medley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes that run a little large!
customer_reviews.text: Great cute shoes! I would order a size smaller next time in getting these male and female type. i have gotten the womens in the past and sizing was spot on. These come in mens size/womens size. I like the extra width in these, but because of that, they were slightly large on me. Go one size smaller when you order. Love love love them and I get alot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Love these Converse!
customer_reviews.text: Color as shown in picture. Shoes arrived in great condition. Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cayden Pobanz

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with converse
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. They came in perfect condition, fit true to size and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha E.

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers are great, but the size was larger than other brands
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are great, but the size was larger than other brands; the low score is for the return policy, you are forced to pay for the return, so I will suggest to never buy from them, if you don't know the exact size of the specific model of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Classic Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for some Chucks! Just as described, shipped fast and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Do run big
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7, 7.5 in women's. Read the reviews about running larger, glad I did. I ordered a 7, they will do but wonder if I could've even done a 6.5. I have room to wiggle my toes, without socks. But love the style, can't wait to wear
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Harper

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple pairs of converse but I really needed some low tops for summer. These are perfect and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Scheidt

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: After having and wearing these consistently for 6 months, I can say with certainty that these are totally fake. I gave two stars because they’re still pretty passable, but the quality is just not up to par with real Converse. The photos say everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gluckman

customer_reviews.title: Classics all the way
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting another pair of the unbleached Converse Chuck Taylor's for years. I am so glad that they fit the same as they did years ago. My feet are a little wide. So I order the unisex size and not the women's shoes, as I find the women's fit snugger. These are made well and I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tnjpearson

customer_reviews.title: Love my Chucks, but they run big.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, but they were a bit big. I ordered a women's 7.5, but they fit more like an 8.5. However, I'm still able to wear them and they are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Is Calling

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, my cousin loves it, it is original and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Shir

customer_reviews.title: Want all the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Love them! Wear size 8 in athletic tennis shoes but in this brand I always order size 7. They fit perfectly and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I only wore these for one day and they started falling apart. I always buy converse but I don’t normally buy them on amazon. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Kluth

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter for christmas. she says they are too big. shes a tall girl but insists on stuffing her feet in shoes that are too small for her. there is no reasoning with her so she can deal with the foot problems in her future. will be returning these for the next size down... I own several pairs of converse shoes and have bought more for my kids. we all love'em.
customer_reviews.author: carnz

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. However, based on reviews, I ordered up and I wish I wouldn't have. We had to return them and get his normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them, can’t go wrong with Chucks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition in original box for about $10 less than stores. Love a new pair of Chucks!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order a bigger size?
customer_reviews.text: These are a little tighter than others I have received. Still trying to break them in. Very tight around my toes and months later, they still hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I have an addiction to my Chucks. I have them in almost every color hahaha! But I really like the color of this pair. It’s a very nice shade, and it’s perfect for fall/winter
customer_reviews.author: M&L Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: I wear between an 8 1/2 and 9 in women's. I purchased a size 7 and they are a little too big. Since I ordered online, I'm not sure whether a 6 1/2 would fit or be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: They're Chucks. What else needs to be said?
customer_reviews.text: White shoes tend to get dirty fast, but my last pair lasted a good 2 years, so I plan to keep buying these classic stylish shoes. And at the 50-dollar range, these are the best style for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great and low price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, should have bought ankle socks to go with it. But great shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jason Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They look great but I can't wear them all day since I ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great but I can't wear them all day since I walk a lot. They are great for the weekend when I walk less. So cute with jeans and fit well and a good price. However, if they weren't a good price I would feel cheated because you can't walk far in them.
customer_reviews.author: RDA

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of them
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of them!! These are my first pair of Chucks. I can see why everybody loves them, but I do have wider feet. They seem to rub my toes, and don't have much arch support. But I didn't get them for their support, I got them for their style. I usually either wear them to work where I sit most of the day or I'll wear them running around. If I was going to be standing all day I wouldn't choose them but I'm very happy with my purchase and will buy another pair after these.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Met expectation
customer_reviews.text: I always loved converse. And this one met my expectation. It’s durable and has a good quality
customer_reviews.author: Arman Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Bought a "very good condition" used pair from the warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: Bought a "very good condition" used pair from the warehouse deals; when I received the shoes, their condition was like new. I normally wear size 8 (women's), but having owned a pair of Converse Chucks before, I knew that they tend to run about a half-size larger. I ordered a 7.5, and length-wise, they fit perfectly. My feet are slightly wider than most girls' feet, so they're a little tight on my pinky toes. I've worn them about a week, and they're getting more comfortable now. White Chucks match with almost any outfit, so I'm really happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kim

customer_reviews.title: The o doesn’t have a star in it like the picture shows and the back of the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think these are authentic converse. The o doesn’t have a star in it like the picture shows and the back of the shoe the work converse is smudged. Needed these for a trip in a couple of days so I probably will end up returning later. So disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Irina Zaremba

customer_reviews.title: I remember Converse running a bit small, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember Converse running a bit small, so I ordered a half size bigger than I usually wear. Just a little bit too big, but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Gollinger

customer_reviews.title: but they are nice and my son can wear them
customer_reviews.text: I order my size according to the size chart, and they are a size to big, but they are nice and my son can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these :) came in just in time for a concert I wanted to wear them to!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought this pair in 2017. Three years later and they are as new. Great quality. Great color. Perfect fit. My favorite pair of converse so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: Too big, again. Maybe they should change their ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big , again . Maybe they should change their sizing seriously , I’ll have to go another size down , I wear a true 7b , too big , these are 61/2 still too big . Yikes y’all
customer_reviews.author: Melody  Haspel

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but choose your size wisely
customer_reviews.text: When buying Converse brand shoes be sure to buy them a size smaller than what you would normally wear with most other brands. Converse uses a different measuring system than other major brands (which makes no sense to me), which is why you should order about a size smaller for males or females. I ordered a female size 7.5 for someone who normally wears a 8.5 in women, and it fit well. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Jurado

product_meta.title: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Canvas Low Top Sneaker
product_meta.description: The low-cut legend since ’57. The Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top sneaker keeps it classic. Iconic elements like an OrthoLite insole and canvas upper keep it comfortable. You got it.
